fundamental features of our universe is called physics.

atoms, which then combined into molecules. The story of 
atoms, molecules and their interactions is called chemistry. 

About 3.8 billion years ago, on a planet called Earth, certain 
molecules combined to form particularly large and intricate 
structures called organisms. The story of organisms is called 
biology.

Homo sapiens started to form even more elaborate 
structures called cultures. The subsequent development of 
these human cultures is called history.
